report.title: UKBMS Occurrence Download Report
report.description: Lists saved occurrences. Normally invoked from download bar on annual summary page.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples parent JOIN samples s ON s.parent_id=parent.id AND s.deleted=false JOIN locations l ON parent.location_id=l.id JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt ON ctt.id=l.location_type_id JOIN locations l2 ON s.location_id=l2.id JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted=false JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND (CAST(cttl.taxon_list_id AS character varying)='#taxon_list_id#' OR '#taxon_list_id#' = '') LEFT JOIN (sample_attributes sa JOIN sample_attribute_values sav ON sav.sample_attribute_id = sa.id AND sav.deleted = false) ON sa.deleted = false AND sav.sample_id = s.id AND sa.caption = '% sun' #joins# WHERE parent.deleted = false AND #website_filter# #filters# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#
report.field_sql: parent.id as sample_id, o.id as occurrence_id, ctt.term as site_type, l.code as site_code, '' as date, --- allows proper positioning of date column in report l2.code as section_name, parent.date_start, parent.date_end, parent.date_type, sav.int_value as section_sun, coalesce(cttl.default_common_name, cttl.preferred_taxon) as common, cttl.preferred_taxon as preferred

order_bys.order_by: l.code, parent.date_start, section_name, cttl.taxonomic_sort_order, o.id DESC

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: taxon_list_id
param.description: ID of the taxon list to show

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: location_id
param.description: Enter the ID of the location

param.name: location_list
param.description: Enter a comma separated list of location IDs
